content.verbatim_text: Each controller and, where applicable, the controller's representative, shall maintain a record of processing activities under its responsibility. That record shall contain: (a) the name and contact details of the controller; (b) the purposes of the processing; (c) a description of the categories of data subjects and personal data; (d) the categories of recipients; (e) transfers to third countries; (f) time limits for erasure; (g) a description of technical and organisational security measures.
content.title: Records of processing activities
